content: "{\"object\":\"value\",\"document\":{\"object\":\"document\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Career Development Program (CDP)\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" \",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-span-mark\",\"data\":{\"style\":{}}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"is an EPAM service providing education for even the most remote EPAM Offices. A significant share of trainings are delivered as webinars via GoToTraining in order to make them accessible everywhere, and a number of major training programs and services are available in many areas where EPAM is present. Please check \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://kb.epam.com/display/EPMCDPSITE\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"CDP space\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" for details and up-to-date information.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"image\",\"data\":{\"src\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/d13b7c17-b10a-4d7e-a9ba-ae18cfc9dfab/cdp.png\",\"imageSize\":{\"width\":1280,\"height\":720}},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Here is list of services that are available in various countries and may be useful first of all for Resource Managers:\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"unordered-list\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://kb.epam.com/display/EPMCDPSITE/Coaching\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Coaching\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" Service can help to translate problems into action items, to prioritize goals and find ways to achieve them. It is support in realization of a person's potential\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://kb.epam.com/display/EPMCDPSITE/ITM\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Introduction to Management Program (M1 Education)\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" - (ITM Program) - designed for novice managers (project management or resource management) with little management experience in order to speed up adaptation to a new role, to form an integral view of the functions and responsibilities of a manager and provide tools of effective management\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://kb.epam.com/display/EPMCDPSITE/EPAM+Managers%27+Communities\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"EPAM Managers' Communities\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" - Do you spend a lot of time on finding the right people and the right answers? Do you create a useful tool or practice, and then find out that the same bicycle has already been invented in another unit? We are sure you could spend your time with better results for you and the company. Join Managers' Community in your location or online to receive the latest company news\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://kb.epam.com/display/EPMCDPSITE/Head+to+Head\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Head to Head\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" helps to improve managers' competencies in negotiations and to increase personal effectiveness with a set of management tools\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://kb.epam.com/display/EPMCDPSITE/Become+a+trainer\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Act as a trainer\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" - Career Development Department is always happy to welcome new trainers, and we really appreciate your willingness to share your experience. With more than 16 thousand employees worldwide, we can say that EPAM covers most possible competencies in software development\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://kb.epam.com/pages/viewpage.action?pageId=284465700\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Managers Mentoring Program\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" – the main goals of this program are: Increasing the pace and quality of managers' professional growth and raising their awareness of career opportunities in EPAM; Sharing the best experience and managerial culture across the company and helping managers in their adaptation to new roles; Encouraging the most effective managers to engage in new initiatives on the corporate level.\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://learn.epam.com/trainings\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"LEARN\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" is a catalog of educational products and services aimed to support continuous professional development of employees and manage learning more effectively. Along with scheduled events, \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://learn.epam.com/trainings\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"LEARN\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" has a global \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://learn.epam.com/catalog/upcoming\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Training Catalog\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" with all CDP courses available, creating greater visibility for learning opportunities. You can use it to subscribe to events. As RM, you must approve requests of your team members, stating the priority of the request (Normal or High). Please see the “to be approved” tab for check requests.. Another option to sign your team members up for a training you feel will be beneficial for them is clicking “Register my team” button on the event's page. All you need to do is select one or several of your direct or indirect team members and click “Select”. Please use “My Team” tab to see list of requests of your team members. You can also create reports by downloading list of requests as an excel file. In case there are no suitable courses in the catalogue, you can submit a request for a new training to be developed, for these purposes please use “Request new training” button on “Requests” tab. Please note that processing of requests takes time. CDP team member can also suggest alternative training options such as recordings, links to external training courses, manuals, books etc.\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"For all training related questions, please contact your regional manager. If there is no regional manager for your country or you don't know who it is, do not hesitate to contact \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"mailto:Valeryia_Kasabutskaya@epam.com\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Valeryia Kasabutskaya\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\", Director of Employee Education, with your questions. If you have any additional questions, please contact your HR Business Partner.\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"http://university.epam.com/\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"University.epam.com\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" is EPAM's own platform for MOOC – Massive Open Online Courses. The main focus of MOOC is \\\"online\\\". All course materials are available at any time, and you can take them at home after work, during lunch or on the bus from/to home. You decide when you will study. Our task is to make sure you can learn the topic of choice in the most effective manner.\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Please address any questions to your mentor, manager, HR BP or \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"mailto:AskAdaptation@epam.com\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Ask Adaptation\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\".\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\n\\n\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}}"
